scripts.build: babel src -d dist --root-mode upward --copy-files && API_TYPE=sgemp-pdv-api node ../../../copy-files.js && javascript-obfuscator dist --output dist --control-flow-flattening --dead-code-injection --debug-protection --disable-console-output --string-array --string-array-encoding base64 --string-array-index-shift --split-strings --split-strings-chunk-length 5 --transform-object-keys true --exclude dist/routes/**/*.js
